metadata.title: Pakistan condoles deaths by earthquake in ChinaÃ¢ÂÂs Xizang region

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 7 (APP): Pakistan on Tuesday expressed heartfelt condolence over the tragic loss of lives caused by the earthquake in Chinaas Autonomous Region Xizang. The Foreign Office spokesperson, in a statement, extended the countryas support to the people and government of China in their relief efforts. aOur thoughts remain with the injured and those still missing. We also extend best wishes for the ongoing rescue operations,a it added. According to Chinaas Xinhua news agency, a 6.8-magnitude earthquake jolted a county in Xizang on Tuesday morning. Fifty-three people have been confirmed dead, and 62 others injured.
summary: Pakistan condoles deaths by earthquake in China's Xizang region.
The country extended support to the people and government of China in their relief efforts.
53 people have been confirmed dead, and 62 others injured.
